Name: goiter
Definition: A thyroid gland disease that involves an abnormal enlargement of the thyroid gland.

Name: thyrocalcitonin secretion disease
Definition: An eye disease that involves the globe of the eye.

Name: thyroid crisis
Definition: A prolapse of female genital organ that is characterized by the descent of a peritoneal sac containing small bowel into the rectovagnial space causing a bulge in the posterior vaginal wall.

Name: obsolete secondary thyroid hyperplasia
Definition: A prolapse of female genital organ that is characterized by the descent of a peritoneal sac containing small bowel into the rectovagnial space causing a bulge in the posterior vaginal wall.

Name: obsolete thyrotoxicosis from ectopic thyroid nodule
Definition: A prolapse of female genital organ that is characterized by the descent of a peritoneal sac containing small bowel into the rectovagnial space causing a bulge in the posterior vaginal wall.
Synonym: Thyrotoxicosis from ectopic thyroid nodule without mention of thyrotoxic crisis or storm

Name: hypothyroidism
Definition: A thyroid gland disease which involves an underproduction of thyroid hormone.

Name: thyroid gland cancer
Definition: An endocrine gland cancer located in the thryoid gland located in the neck below the thyroid cartilage.

Name: hyperthyroxinemia
Definition: A chronic lymphocytic leukemia that is characterized by over production of B cells (lymphocytes) by the bone marrow where the B cells appear hairy under a microscope.

Name: euthyroid sick syndrome
Definition: A chronic lymphocytic leukemia that is characterized by over production of B cells (lymphocytes) by the bone marrow where the B cells appear hairy under a microscope.

Name: obsolete abscess of thyroid
Definition: A chronic lymphocytic leukemia that is characterized by over production of B cells (lymphocytes) by the bone marrow where the B cells appear hairy under a microscope.

Name: thyroid adenoma
Definition: An endocrine organ benign neoplasm that is located_in the thyroid and derives_from glandular epithelial cells.

Name: thyroiditis
Definition: A viral infectious disease that affects CD8 lymphocytes

Name: thyrotoxicosis
Definition: A thyroid gland disease that is characterized by excess thyroid hormone.

Name: hyperthyroidism
Definition: A thyroid gland disease that involves an over production of thyroid hormone.

Name: thyroid malformation
Definition: A bone marrow disease characterized by an increased number of red blood cells in the bloodstream resulting in thicker blood and reduced blood flow.

Name: obsolete Drug dependence complicating pregnancy
Definition: A bone marrow disease characterized by an increased number of red blood cells in the bloodstream resulting in thicker blood and reduced blood flow.
